name: Menstrudel
description: Period tracking app - Free, offline, and open source.
readme_summary: Menstrudel is a free, private, and open-source period and pill tracking mobile application built with Flutter. It offers smart cycle tracking, predictive insights, effortless pill management, LARC tracking, and customizable reminders, with all data stored securely offline on the user's device.
key_features: LARC usage tracking and renewal reminders
primary_use_case: To provide users with a private, offline, and intuitive mobile application for tracking their menstrual cycle, managing birth control pills, and receiving timely reminders and predictions.
cover_image_prompt: A serene, stylized illustration of a woman gently tending to a vibrant, blooming flower. The flower's petals subtly transform into calendar pages and small pill icons, representing the tracking of menstrual cycles and pill intake. Soft, glowing data particles flow from the woman's hands towards the flower, symbolizing the input of personal data. In the background, a subtle, abstract visualization of a smooth, flowing wave represents the predictive insights of the menstrual cycle. The overall mood is calm and empowering, with a clean, modern aesthetic. The 'Menstrudel' app icon is subtly placed on a small, floating digital tablet in the corner. Style: 3D isometric illustration with soft lighting and a pastel color palette.

name: pop
description: Send emails from your terminal ðŸ“¬
readme_summary: Pop is a command-line tool written in Go that allows users to send emails directly from their terminal. It supports both a text-based user interface (TUI) and a command-line interface (CLI), offering flexibility for different workflows. Pop can integrate with email services like Resend or traditional SMTP, and can be combined with other CLI tools for advanced email automation.
key_features: Environment variable configuration for sender and signature
Integration with other CLI tools (mods, gum, invoice)
primary_use_case: Sending emails directly from the command line, enabling automation and integration with other terminal-based workflows.
cover_image_prompt: A stylized, minimalist scene depicting a digital messenger bird carrying an email envelope. The bird is made of glowing code snippets and data streams, flying from a computer terminal screen towards a stylized cloud representing the internet. The envelope has a subtle 'pop' logo. The background is a clean, dark gradient with subtle circuit board patterns. The overall mood is efficient and modern, highlighting the seamless transition of information from the terminal to email. The style should be 3D isometric illustration with a focus on clean lines and glowing digital elements.

name: svelte
description: web development for the rest of us
readme_summary: Svelte is a modern JavaScript compiler that shifts work from the browser to the build step. It compiles your declarative component code into efficient, imperative JavaScript that surgically updates the DOM, resulting in highly performant applications without the overhead of a virtual DOM.
primary_use_case: Building performant web applications by compiling components into efficient JavaScript.
cover_image_prompt: A master craftsman, representing Svelte, meticulously carving intricate wooden components (UI elements) from raw lumber (code). Instead of a hammer and chisel, the craftsman uses a glowing, digital chisel that emits streams of efficient, perfectly formed code. The carved components seamlessly assemble themselves into a beautiful, functional miniature building (web application) on a workbench. Subtle visual cues like flowing data particles and small, clean UI elements on a nearby screen hint at the digital nature of the process. The scene is brightly lit, with a focus on the precise, almost magical transformation. Rendered in a 3D isometric illustration style with a clean, modern aesthetic.

name: call-center-ai
description: Send a phone call from AI agent, in an API call. Or, directly call the bot from the configured phone number!
readme_summary: Call Center AI is a Python-based solution that leverages Azure and OpenAI GPT to enable AI-powered phone calls. It allows for both initiating outbound calls from an AI agent via API and direct inbound calls to a configured bot number, suitable for various customer service applications.
key_features: Integration with Azure and OpenAI GPT (gpt-4.1, gpt-4.1-nano)
Real-time conversation streaming and resume after disconnections
Support for multiple languages and voice tones
Customizable prompts and brand-specific custom voice
Human agent fallback and call recording
Cloud-native deployment on Azure with serverless architecture
Integration with Azure Communication Services and Cognitive Services
primary_use_case: Automating and enhancing customer service interactions through AI-driven phone calls, handling tasks like IT support, insurance inquiries, and general customer service.
cover_image_prompt: A friendly, modern AI robot assistant is holding a glowing telephone receiver, with sound waves transforming into clear speech bubbles and data streams flowing into a stylized representation of a call center. On one side, a customer is shown smiling while receiving information, and on the other, a small API interface is visible, indicating the system's integration capabilities. Subtle digital particles and a clean, professional color palette enhance the futuristic yet accessible feel. The scene should be rendered in a 3D isometric illustration style, emphasizing seamless communication and intelligent automation in a call center environment.

name: galaxy
description: The largest Open-Source UI Library! Community-made and free to use. Made with either CSS or Tailwind.
readme_summary: Galaxy is a large, community-driven open-source UI library containing over 3000 unique UI elements. These elements are sourced from Uiverse.io and can be implemented using CSS or Tailwind.
primary_use_case: Providing developers with a vast collection of pre-designed UI components to quickly build and style web interfaces.
cover_image_prompt: A cosmic librarian meticulously organizing a vast nebula filled with glowing, distinct UI components like buttons, cards, and forms. The librarian is handing a beautifully crafted UI element to a developer who is eagerly reaching out, symbolizing easy access and implementation. Subtle streams of code and data particles flow between the nebula and the developer. The background is a deep space setting with the repository name 'Galaxy' subtly integrated into a star cluster. The overall mood is one of discovery and effortless creation. Rendered in a 3D isometric illustration style with a vibrant, futuristic color palette.
